name: Blaster Buds
description:
When you are confined in Space, miles away from home, there is little to do but Blaster your Bud!

Have you ever heard when you do something affects someone? In a little ship, floating in space, you are you but you are also the other one. So, watch out! This puzzle game will lead you to think carefully the best option.

Will you manage to reach victory without blowing in thousand pieces?

Will you manage to beat yourself?

RetroSpace is back, full of pew pews, explosions, awesome music and more! What are you waiting for?

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

R - Restart
